detail_desc: Slides with an adjustable strap and buckle over the foot. Imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Short coat in a soft wool blend with notch lapels and one button at the front. Dropped shoulders and a short, rounded slit at the cuffs. Welt side pockets and rounded slits in the sides. Unlined.
Sandals with narrow foot straps and a heel strap with covered elastication. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 1 cm.
Sandals with narrow foot straps and a heel strap with covered elastication. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 1 cm.
Sandals with narrow foot straps and a heel strap with covered elastication. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 1 cm.
Sandals with narrow foot straps and a heel strap with covered elastication. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 1 cm.

Knee-length dress in mesh with a flock-print pattern. Round neckline with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, and 3/4-length puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and hem for added width and soft draping. Jersey underdress.

Straight-style, ankle-length dress in patterned satin with a draped collar and concealed zip at the back. Dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and wide cuffs with a concealed zip. Diagonal seam from the hips, and an asymmetric hem. Unlined.
Hairband in braided imitation suede decorated with fabric flowers and butterflies. Elasticated at the back.
Fully lined bikini in a textured-knit finish. Top with narrow, double, adjustable shoulder straps. The polyester content of the bikini is partly recycled.

Blouse in airy, pattern-weave viscose with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Low dropped shoulders, long puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Fully lined bikini. Triangle top with a decorative bow at the front, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that fasten at the back of the neck and a plastic fastener at the back. Matching bottoms with bows at the sides.

Fully lined bikini. Triangle top with a decorative bow at the front, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that fasten at the back of the neck and a plastic fastener at the back. Matching bottoms with bows at the sides.
Narrow, fabric-covered Alice band decorated with plastic beads and a tulle ribbon at each end.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a waist panel and flared legs.
Narrow, elastic hairband decorated with fabric flowers.
Fully lined, glittery bandeau bikini top with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Overlocked frill trim at the top, and side support. No fasteners.
Calf-length skirt in a fine knit containing some wool. High waist with a ribbed, elasticated waistband, and a slit at the back. The polyester content of the skirt is recycled.
Calf-length skirt in a fine knit containing some wool. High waist with a ribbed, elasticated waistband, and a slit at the back. The polyester content of the skirt is recycled.

Boxy jacket in wide-wale cotton corduroy with a collar, large buttons at the front, patch pockets with a flap and button and a concealed side pocket at the front. Dropped shoulders and straight sleeves with adjustable tabs and buttons at the cuffs. Unlined.

Boxy jacket in wide-wale cotton corduroy with a collar, large buttons at the front, patch pockets with a flap and button and a concealed side pocket at the front. Dropped shoulders and straight sleeves with adjustable tabs and buttons at the cuffs. Unlined.

Boxy jacket in wide-wale cotton corduroy with a collar, large buttons at the front, patch pockets with a flap and button and a concealed side pocket at the front. Dropped shoulders and straight sleeves with adjustable tabs and buttons at the cuffs. Unlined.
Chinos in cotton twill with a soft, brushed finish. High waist with a detachable fabric belt, zip fly and button, side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Chinos in cotton twill with a soft, brushed finish. High waist with a detachable fabric belt, zip fly and button, side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and slightly wider, tapered legs.
High-waisted trousers in a soft cotton weave with a detachable tie belt, front pockets and tapered legs with a tab and metal D-rings at the hems.
High-waisted trousers in a soft cotton weave with a detachable tie belt, front pockets and tapered legs with a tab and metal D-rings at the hems.
Espadrilles in imitation leather with a braided jute trim around the soles and crossover foot straps with a decorative metal ring at the top. Imitation leather insoles. Platform at the back 5.5 cm.
Espadrilles in imitation leather with a braided jute trim around the soles and crossover foot straps with a decorative metal ring at the top. Imitation leather insoles. Platform at the back 5.5 cm.
A-line dress in tulle with embroidered appliqués in the shape of pineapples. Narrow, elasticated shoulder straps and a gathered seam and flounce at the hem. Lined.

Sports bralette in ribbed, fast-drying functional fabric with wide shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. Racer back with a cut-out detail. The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Light support.

Sports bralette in ribbed, fast-drying functional fabric with wide shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. Racer back with a cut-out detail. The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Light support.

Sports bralette in ribbed, fast-drying functional fabric with wide shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. Racer back with a cut-out detail. The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Light support.

The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Light support.

The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Light support.

Sports bralette in ribbed, fast-drying functional fabric with wide shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. Racer back with a cut-out detail. The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Light support.
Scrunchies in woven fabric with a decorative bow. One with broderie anglaise, one in a solid colour, and one checked.
Skirt in a patterned cotton weave with covered elastication and a decorative grosgrain bow at the waist, and side pockets. Lined.

Short dungaree shorts in washed, stretch, flexible cotton denim for maximum comfort. Hard-worn details and patterned pocket linings that are visible through the denim. Adjustable straps with a metal fastener, a seam at the waist and press-studs at the sides. Fake fly, side and back pockets and raw-edge hems.
Shirt jacket in cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Chest pockets and patch pockets with a flap and a button.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, flap front pockets and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, flap front pockets and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Cropped, sleeveless sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a twisted detail at the hem.
T-shirt in slub linen jersey with a low-cut neckline.
T-shirt in slub linen jersey with a low-cut neckline.
T-shirt in slub linen jersey with a low-cut neckline.
Gently fitted, double-breasted jacket in linen with wide, rounded notch lapels, welt front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Unlined.

Pull-on trousers in an airy viscose weave with elastication and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Fake fly, patch front pockets, flap leg pockets with a button and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Pearly plastic bead stud earrings. Size from 0.2 cm to 1.2 cm.
Pyjama bottoms in jersey made from a viscose blend with a soft, brushed finish. Elasticated, drawstring waist and straight, wide legs.
Pyjama bottoms in jersey made from a viscose blend with a soft, brushed finish. Elasticated, drawstring waist and straight, wide legs.

Shaping thong briefs in microfibre with a firm sculpting effect on the waist. High waist, lined gusset and a string back. The briefs are designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under clothes.

Long dress in airy, patterned, crinkled chiffon with a V-neck and small stand-up collar with narrow ties at the front. Long, wide sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, a smocked seam at the waist and a gently gathered, softly draping skirt. Lined.

Biker body in microfibre with a gentle sculpting effect on the waist, bum and thighs. Adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. The body is designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Trainers in canvas with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles. Platform 3 cm.
Trainers in canvas with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles. Platform 3 cm.
Trainers in canvas with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles. Platform 3 cm.
Trainers in canvas with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles. Platform 3 cm.
Bra in ribbed jersey with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Bra in ribbed jersey with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Bra in ribbed jersey with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Bra in ribbed jersey with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Set with a hair grip, hair clip and a pair of hoop earrings in metal decorated with beads in different designs. Length 7 cm. Diameter of earrings 3.5 cm.
Shaping briefs in jersey with a high waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back. The briefs have a firm sculpting effect on the waist.

V-neck playsuit in satin with a slight sheen. Opening and button at the back of the neck, cap sleeves and a seam at the waist with covered elastication at the back and a detachable soft belt with metal D-rings. Side pockets and wide legs with pleats at the top. Unlined.

V-neck playsuit in satin with a slight sheen. Opening and button at the back of the neck, cap sleeves and a seam at the waist with covered elastication at the back and a detachable soft belt with metal D-rings. Side pockets and wide legs with pleats at the top. Unlined.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short-sleeved tops in ribbed organic cotton jersey with a round, scallop-trimmed neckline.
Short-sleeved tops in ribbed organic cotton jersey with a round, scallop-trimmed neckline.
Short-sleeved tops in ribbed organic cotton jersey with a round, scallop-trimmed neckline.

Long dress in softly draping chiffon with a deep V-neck decorated with a pleated flounce that continues over each shoulder and down the back where it turns into narrow ribbons that cross and tie. Seam under the bust, a concealed zip in one side and a flared, pleated skirt. Satin lining.

Long dress in softly draping chiffon with a deep V-neck decorated with a pleated flounce that continues over each shoulder and down the back where it turns into narrow ribbons that cross and tie. Seam under the bust, a concealed zip in one side and a flared, pleated skirt. Satin lining.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Fully lined, ribbed, shimmering metallic bikini. Top with a plastic fastener at the back.

Fully lined bikini in frill-trimmed seersucker. Top with an adjustable neck strap and a plastic fastener at the back. Bottoms with an elasticated waist. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.

Blouse in a softly draping weave made from recycled polyester. Small, gathered stand-up collar, a small opening and button at the back of the neck, long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Lined at the front.

Blouse in a softly draping weave made from recycled polyester. Small, gathered stand-up collar, a small opening and button at the back of the neck, long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Lined at the front.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a collar, button placket, short puff sleeves with ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides. Small embroidery detail at the front.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a collar, button placket, short puff sleeves with ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides. Small embroidery detail at the front.
Lined, non-wired bikini top. Wide shoulder straps with a decorative ring, and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Covered elastication at the hem. No fasteners.
Lined, non-wired bikini top. Wide shoulder straps with a decorative ring, and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Covered elastication at the hem. No fasteners.
